name: Journey of a Sprite (RPG)
description:
👾Journey of a Sprite Demo👾

A RPG Game where you play in a dungeon!!

This is just a demo, working on the full game.

Feel free to give suggestions! 💙

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

WASD / ARROW KEYS - Move

SPACE - Attack

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
